name: Game & Watch Gallery (itch)
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.0 (beta) Details Title Game & Watch Gallery Series Game Boy Model No. DMG-AGAE Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date February 1, 1997 Chipset Sharp LR35902 ( 4.2 MHz ) Description

Game & Watch Gallery is a collection of four classic Game & Watch titles from Nintendo released on the Game Boy handheld console.

Gameplay

You can play each of the four Game & Watch titles included in this collection (Manhole, Fire, Octopus and Oil Panic) based on the gameplay of the original LCD handhelds (Classic mode) or in an updated version (Modern mode) with new graphics featuring all your favorite Nintendo characters.

Controls Keyboard Up W or Up Arrow Down S or Down Arrow Left A or Left Arrow Right D or Right Arrow Select Space Start Enter Button A X or CTRL Button B Z or SHIFT Mouse Rotate Drag Press Left-click Zoom Mousewheel
